pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Baby Essential Oil Baby Sleep 12ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Gentle essential oil blends designed to help baby through the day and night.

Common Uses

Baby Sleep Assist with Mandarin, Sweet Orange, Lavender and Roman Chamomile essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy, will help soothe and assist in sleep.

Ingredients

Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Oil

Directions

How to Use: Use as required or up to 6 times a day.
Vaporisation: Add up to 6 drops (0.3mL) to the water in your vaporiser.
